title: Europe’s Space Agency Says Cyber Incident May Have Hit Servers
description: The European Space Agency said a cybersecurity issue may have impacted a “very small number” of external servers.

title: US Lifts Sanctions on Trio Accused of Work on ‘Predator’ Spyware
description: The US government has lifted sanctions on three people who it previously accused of aiding in the proliferation of “Predator” spyware, a sophisticated surveillance technology that’s allegedly been used against Americans.

title: Apollo to Sell Coinstar to Alaska Buyer, Bonds Set to Be Repaid
description: Coinstar LLC, the coin-exchange and cryptocurrency business owned by Apollo Global Management Inc., plans to repay bondholders next month as part of its surprise sale to a company that oversees investments for natives of Alaska’s far north, according to people familiar with the matter.
